Sri Krishna College of Arts and Science, Coimbatore offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs across Arts, Science and Commerce. Ask about courses, admissions, fees, placements or contact details for more information.
We offer UG and PG programs including B.Sc, B.Com, BBA, BCA, BA, M.Sc and M.Com. Tell me which stream you are interested in (Science / Commerce / Arts).
Undergraduate programs include B.Sc. (Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry), B.Com., BBA, BCA, BA (English, Economics). See the department pages for specialization details.
Postgraduate programs include M.Sc., M.Com. and discipline-specific PG courses. Check the Admissions or Departments page for up-to-date PG offerings.
Admissions are processed via the college application form. Visit the Admissions page on the website, complete the form and submit required documents. Contact admissions office for assistance.

Eligibility depends on the program. Generally UG applicants should have passed 10+2 in a relevant stream. PG applicants need a relevant UG degree. Refer to the specific course page for exact criteria.
Fee structure varies by program and year. Please check the Fees page on the college website for exact figures. You can also tell me the program and I'll provide approximate guidance.
The college provides scholarships and concessions based on merit and need. Scholarship details and application procedures are available on the Scholarships page.
Our placement cell facilitates campus recruitment and training. Companies from IT, Finance and other sectors visit campus. For placement statistics and top recruiters see the Placements page.
The college has departments including Computer Science, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Commerce and English. Ask about a specific department for more details.
Our faculty includes experienced professors and lecturers across departments. For faculty lists and profiles see the Faculty or Department pages on the website.
Hostel facilities are available subject to availability. Facilities include mess, rooms and security. Contact the Student Affairs or Hostel office for application and fee details.
The college library holds books, journals and e-resources. Timings and membership information are on the Library page of the website.
The college hosts seminars, workshops and cultural events throughout the year. See the Events or News section on the website for schedules and registration details.
College transport services operate on specified routes. Check the Transport section or contact the office for routes, timings and fees.
Academic calendar, semester dates, exam schedules and holidays are published on the Academic Calendar page. Check the website for the current year's schedule.
Syllabus and curriculum highlights for each program are available on the relevant department or course pages. Tell me the course you want the syllabus for.
The college has achievements in academics, research and extracurriculars. Accreditation and ranking information is on the About/Accreditations page.
Admissions Office: +91-XXXXXXXXXX. Email: admissions@example.edu (replace with real contact). For exact phone numbers and emails, check the Contact page on the college website.
Sri Krishna College of Arts and Science is located in Coimbatore. See the Contact/Location page for the full postal address and map directions.
You can download application forms, brochures and timetables from the Downloads/Notices section on the website. Ask me for the specific document name if you need help locating it.
